remarks: A well-founded successor is a lower bound on points after ` X ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Jun-2018.)
statement:
wsuclb.1 $e |- ( ph -> R We A ) $.
wsuclb.2 $e |- ( ph -> R Se A ) $.
wsuclb.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
wsuclb.4 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. A ) $.
wsuclb.5 $e |- ( ph -> X R Y ) $.
wsuclb $p |- ( ph -> -. Y R wsuc ( R , A , X ) ) $.
